name: Skeleton Cannoneer
languages: understands languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Dead Firearms
entries: The cannon and pistol a skeleton cannoneer uses are nonfunctional as ranged weapons for a creature other than a skeleton cannoneer. For the skeleton cannoneer, the pistol never needs to be reloaded.

actions.name: Load
entries: The skeleton cannoneer loads the dead cannon.

actions.name: Dead Cannon
entries: The skeleton cannoneer fires its loaded cannon at a point it can see within 500 feet of it, but no closer than 50 feet from it. Each creature within 15 feet of that point must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6 damage) bludgeoning damage and 7 (2d6 damage) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Alternatively, the cannoneer can choose the cannon as the point of fire. Doing so means the shot goes off inside the cannon, destroying it and increasing each type of damage by 3 ({@dice 1d6}).

actions.name: Pistol Club
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage and 3 (1d6 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Dead Pistol
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) necrotic damage.
